casebody.data:
October 27, 1947.

Per Curiam Decision.

No. 376. Miami Transportation Co., Inc. v. United States et al. United States v. Carolina Freight Carriers Corp., 315 U. S. 475. Howell Ellis for appellant. Solicitor General Perlman and Daniel W. Knowlton for the United States and the Interstate Commerce Commission, appellees. Per Curiam:

The motion to affirm is granted and the judgment is affirmed.
